listing.title: I Are Gamer is LIVE .. AGAIN!
listing.description: We stopped charging for servers back in the spring of 2020 when the Pandemic began. Since its kind of winding down, we have decided to again start charging for the servers.

listing.title: NEW Location Available !
listing.description:
We have just added a server in Amsterdam, Netherlands.
This is a Linux server and will be hosting games such as Gmod, TF2, Insurgency, Counter-Strike and all the Oldies but Goodies

listing.title: London is now available!
listing.description: We are expanding again and have recently added London has a new location for server hosting. If you would like to move your server to London submit a ticket and we can do that for you

listing.title: Minecraft Servers are now FREE
listing.description:
we are now hosting small Minecraft servers providing 2 GB of RAM for Free.. You can upload any version of Minecraft you want to run.

these small personal servers will be able to run a handful of plug-ins and provide up to 30 players

if you Outgrow this size server I need something larger just ask and we can provide you with one of those
